item.description:
Please note: This Date is currently tentative. Will update as soon as the real date is known.

Get your Irish Up!

Event held rain or shine!

Max's O’Hartford 5K and Wee Mile o’fficially caps off Hartford's weekend St. Patrick's festivities. Join in this moving party through downtown streets. COSTUMES ENCOURAGED! Prizes awarded to the most uniquely dressed participants. Irish bagpipers, Celtic fiddlers, Max Restaurant Group refreshments and Thomas Hooker's Irish Red Ale all waiting for you!
item.name: Max's O'Hartford 5K
